Although a subnet CIDR reservation can include IP addresses that are already in use, it will not unassign those currently in use. Furthermore, users can reserve multiple CIDR ranges per subnet, but these ranges must not overlap. When a subnet reservation is deleted, any unused IP addresses become available for AWS to reassign, without affecting in-use addresses.
